name: クリア
message: "Oh, Master. Good morning!"
A pervert is standing there, naked except for an apron, a gas mask, and gloves.
He's holding a knife, his ass hanging out, wiggling without shame.

name: クリア
message: "I'm almost done with breakfast! Please have a seat."

name: クリア
message: "Did you sleep well? Did you notice your room was sparkling clean? I took the time to clean while you were asleep!"

name: クリア
message: "Yes? What is it, Master?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Are you outta your fucking mind?!"

name: クリア
message: "Owwww!"
Unable to process the sight accosting my eyes, I roundhouse kick him in the jaw.
He crumples to the floor, wailing.

name: クリア
message: "You're so cruel! I've been working my fingers to the bone for you!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You couldn't do it normally?!"

name: クリア
message: "But they say the naked apron is every man's fantasy! I thought you'd be happy, Master."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where did you hear that shit?! Just put some clothes on already!"

name: クリア
message: "Okaaay..."
Clear is still sobbing when he gets up and leaves the bar.
Naked man ass right in front of my face...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sheesh, what's he thinking? There's weird and then there's weird."

name: 蓮
message: "I guess you could say he made an ass out of himself."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Yeah, you can say that again..."
I side-eye Clear as he heads back to his bedroom, then let out a sigh and sink into the couch.
He calls this breakfast? There's way too much food on the table.
...Still, it actually looks pretty edible. Tasty, even.
But think about who made it. It might look good, and it might even taste good, but it could also have some weird-ass side effects or something.
...I am hungry, though.
The smell proves too much for my empty stomach, convincing me to reach―slowly―for a fork.
I skewer a piece of the chicken-looking meat, brace myself... and pop it into my mouth.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...It's good."

name: クリア
message: "Isn't it?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Woah!"
Shit! I almost stabbed him with the fork!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Man... Don't scare me like that."

name: クリア
message: "I'm sorry. But I did change like you asked!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Did you make all this?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes."

name: クリア
message: "Is it good? It's good, right? I heard you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well... Yeah. It's good."

name: クリア
message: "Oh, I'm so glad! All my hard work paid off!"
Clear claps his hands together cheerfully.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You're obviously good at cleaning, too. Where'd you learn all this?"

name: クリア
message: "Some I was taught; some I learned on my own, while taking care of the nice old man I lived with."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh, cool. But where'd you find the ingredients?"

name: クリア
message: "I got them from this supermarket place nearby."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You 'got' them?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes. They give guests as much as they want."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh... I guess I should've expected no less from our lord and savior Toue with his quest to bring happiness to all of humanity."
After that, I let my hunger take control and start stuffing my face with various items from the spread.

name: クリア
message: "That corn soup is one of my specialties. I made it super creamy."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Mmmhmm, it's great."

name: クリア
message: "And I think this omelette turned out particularly well too. How is it?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Delicious."

name: クリア
message: "I'm so glad!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Wait! This is no time to be indulging in a luxurious breakfast!"

name: クリア
message: "W-Wah! Be careful, Master!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...My bad."
In my haste, I almost knocked the table over.
Shit... Clear's cooking is so good, I almost forgot why we're here.
